title: Noam Chomsky Breadcrumbs: Are The Democratic Debates Manufacturing Our Votes?
description:
Discover how elements of the Noam Chomsky and Edward S. Herman's classic "Manufacturing Consent" play out in real time during the 2020 Democratic Debates.
